07 April 2022 |
New Song: 'All I Know' out July 28th

The song is their third single off of the "Waterfall" mixtape coming out September 23rd.

14 March 2022 | Live
SXSW 2022 and tour announcement

Month long US tour announced on the road to South by Southwest

11 March 2022 | Gorilla Vs Bear
Feature: COUCH PRINTS – 'Horsepower'

As Couch Prints make their way across the country (Nashville tonight!) en route to Texas for SXSW next week (IRL this time!), the New York group drop their second gorgeous single of 2022.

11 Feb 2022 | Live
New Music Video: COUCH PRINTS – 'IMPRESSIONS'

Directed by the band's Jake Truax.

4 Feb 2022 | glamglare
Feature: COUCH PRINTS – IMPRESSIONS

Think yourself on a beach somewhere, listening to the waves crashing in. The magic push and pull is captured in Couch Prints‘ newest song, the beautifully bright “impressions.” And while the constant rhythm is soothing there’s also some fierce counter element to the calming part.

23. Sep 2020 | NYLON Magazine
PREMIERE: SYNTH TRIO COUCH PRINTS PAIR THEIR DREAMY TUNES WITH SURREAL VIDEOS

NYC synth-pop trio Couch Prints makes atmospheric tunes they like to pair with striking, slightly bizarre videos...another stunning tune that's all soaring synths and Roberts' crystalline vocals...

30. Oct 2020 | Atwood Magazine
Interview: COUCH PRINTS’ DEBUT EP ‘TELL U’ IS AN EXPLORATION OF THE UNIVERSALITY OF HUMAN EXPERIENCE

A profound illumination of the ineffable, Couch Prints’ debut EP ‘Tell U’ is an intimate rendering of the self and the world.
